data.title: AHA blog: What the WSJ Got Wrong about Pediatric Readiness
data.meta_description: “A recent article in the Wall Street Journal wants you to believe that many of our nation’s emergency departments are incapable of caring for children,” writes Chris DeRienzo, M.D., AHA senior vice president and chief physician executive.
